content: this is the pattern for a dolphin appliqué **i do have this pattern available for free on my website if you would prefer that option the link is down below but i ve made it available for people to download as well for $1 on ravelry ** there is also a video tutorial for the pattern available on my youtube channel at crochet dolphin tutorial 1 i ve used 2 ply cotton and a 1mm crochet hook but you can use different sizes depending on what you re most comfortable with * crochet cotton or wool i used scheepjes maxi sugar rush 2 ply crochet cotton colours 074 mercury and 106 snow white * a crochet hook i used a 1mm hook * scissors * darning needle to weave in ends * sewing thread and needle to stitch the dolphin together * black cotton to embroider on eye marking if desired 1 https //youtu be/hw5age56rfy
